prose.howTo: Add to favourites via the menu button near the device or app name.

App.FavoritesEnabled.title: Enable favourites
App.FavoritesEnabled.help:
Controls the availability of the favourites feature in RAWeb. 

If enabled, users will be able to favorite apps and desktops and access them from the favourites page. 

If disabled, the favourites feature will not be available. 

If not configured, each user will be able to control this setting.
